text:
AqdiqtyaM garBaqM paya#sA samaq~jjanth saqhasra#sya pratiqmAM ~MviqSvarU#paM | 
pari# vRu~ggdhiq hara#sAq mA&Bi mRu#kShaH SaqtAyu#ShaM kRuNuhi cIqyamA#naH || 
iqmaM mA hi(gm)#sIrdviqpAda#M paSUqnA(gm) saha#srAkShaq mEdhaq A cIqyamA#naH | 
maqyumA#raqNyamanu# tE diSAmiq tEna# cinvAqnastaqnuvOq ni ShI#da || 
vAta#syaq dhrAjiqM ~Mvaru#Nasyaq nABiqmaSva#M jaj~jAqna(gm) sa#riqrasyaq maddhyE$ | 
SiSu#M naqdInAq(gm)q hariqmadri#buddhaqmagnEq mA hi(gm)#sIH - [  ] 42
